articles.author: Lynn Butler
articles.title: De Kock's retirement a 'big loss,' says Bavuma as Proteas name team for first ODI in Bloem
articles.description: Proteas captain Temba Bavuma says he understands Quinton de Kock's decision to focus primarily on T20 cricket as he revealed the starting XI for the opening ODI against Australia.
articles.content: Proteas captain Temba Bavuma said on Wednesday that he understands Quinton de Kock's decision to focus primarily on T20 cricket as he revealed the South African starting XI for their opening ODI agai… [+262 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
